location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Sir Evan Nepean, Baronet, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government that the Resident has forwarded a packet to India from Bussora [Basra], containing intelligence from Europe via the HC Cruizer Vestal; it is noted that the vessel in question also needs to replenish its salt supply.
